Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Contracts

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Contracts
Oversight - Maintaining Vendor Integrity Through the Pandemic.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - Maintaining Vendor Integrity Through the Pandemic.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to establishing a special inspector within the department of investigation to review contracts that were entered into in response to the 2019 novel coronavirus, and providing for the repeal of such provision upon the expiration thereof
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing a special inspector within the DOI to review contracts that were entered into in response to the 2019 novel coronavirus, and providing for the repeal of such provision upon the expiration thereof.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the establishment of standards and procedures to determine the existence of conflicts of interest and other misconduct concerning city contracts
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of standards and procedures to determine the existence of conflicts of interest and other misconduct concerning city contracts.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring officers and employees of city contractors to report corruption and to cooperate with the department of investigation
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring officers and employees of city contractors to report corruption and to cooperate with the DOI.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Gennaro, Nurse, Ariola and Lee
